scripts.bench:ponder: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && rm -rf data/ && docker-compose up --detach -p 8545:8545 && tsup-node && (node dist/ponder.mjs|| true) && docker-compose down
scripts.bench:subgraph: export $(grep -v '^#' .env.local | xargs) && rm -rf data/ && docker-compose up --detach && tsup-node && (node dist/subgraph.mjs || true) && docker-compose down
